compound_name.ui:help: Give your submission a unique name that allows you to identify it
compound_name.ui:placeholder: Enter a unique name for this compound submission

first_name.ui:help: Provide the name of the person who should be contacted about submission status.

last_name.ui:help: Provide the name of the person who should be contacted about submission status.

role_title.ui:help: Provide the title of the person who should be contacted about submission status.

institution.ui:help: Provide the institution of the person who should be contacted about submission status.

email.ui:help: Provide the email address of the person who should be contacted about submission status.

other_applicants.ui:placeholder: Enter the names of any collaborators/co-applicants

data_sharing.ui:help: The PTC makes data generated by the core public by default. Please indicate if you agree to data sharing or if you would like to discuss this further.

chemical_name.ui:help: Please provide the chemical name of the compound to be tested (e.g. alpha-ethyl-2-oxo-1-pyrrolidineacetamide).

common_name.ui:help: Please provide the common name of the compound to be tested (e.g. Levetiracetam).

iupac_name.ui:help: Please provide the IUPAC name of this compound (e.g. (S)-2-(2-oxopyrrolidin-1-yl)butanamide).

CAS_number.ui:placeholder: Enter the CAS number (if available), including hyphens.
CAS_number.ui:help: Please provide the Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS) number for this compound (e.g. 103765-01-1).

drug_class.ui:help: Please provide the drug class for this compound (e.g. anticonvulsant)

compound_availability.ui:placeholder: How much compound is available for testing?
compound_availability.ui:help: Please provide in milligrams (mg) the amount of compound you can provide for drug testing by the Preclinical Testing Core (PTC). Note that grams of the compound may be required for testing.

molecular_weight.ui:help: Please provide the molecular weight of the compound in grams per mole (g/mol).

compound_concentration.ui:title: Concentration (mg/ml)
compound_concentration.ui:placeholder: What is the concentration of the solution?
compound_concentration.ui:help: Please provide the concentration of the compound in mg/ml.

compound_purity.ui:placeholder: Please describe the purity of the compound.

molecular_target.ui:help: Please provide the name of the molecular target of the compound (e.g. BACE1).
molecular_target.ui:placeholder: Enter the molecular target (i.e. gene symbol, protein name, metabolite name).

moa_description.ui:help: Describe the pharmacological mechanism at the molecular target (e.g. inhibition of BACE1).

therapeutic_approach.ui:help: Please select the therapeutic approach for this compound.

therapeutic_indication_description.ui:help: Please describe the therapeutic indication of this compound (i.e. Abeta reduction, Tau reduction, anti-inflammatory, etc).

storage_temperature.ui:help: Please provide the storage conditions and temperature required to minimize degradation of this compound.

water_soluble.ui:help: Please indicate if the compound is soluble in aqueous solutions.

solubility_limitations.ui:help: Please provide the solubility limitations of the compound when dissolved in the ideal solvent.
solubility_limitations.ui:title: Solubility Limitations
solubility_limitations.ui:placeholder: Describe any solubility limitations of this compound.

route.ui:help: Please select the intended route of delivery fo this compound once formulated.

binding.ui:title: Cell Line-Binding
binding.ui:description: Start entering data by selecting “Add Data”. If you have data from multiple cell lines, you can select “Add Data” again to add additional data.

name.ui:placeholder: Enter a unique name for this experiment.

assay_description.ui:placeholder: Describe the assay used to measure binding.

binding_affinity_constant.ui:help: Select which type of binding affinity constant was reported in the previous entry.

efficacy.ui:title: Cell Line-Efficacy
efficacy.ui:description: Start entering data by selecting “Add Data”. If you have data from multiple cell lines, you can select “Add Data” again to add additional data.

name.ui:placeholder: Enter a unique name for this experiment.

assay_description.ui:help: Please describe the efficacy assay conditions and cell lines used in the determination of the EC50/IC50 values reported below.

outcome_measures.ui:help: Please provide the outcome measures that were used to determine the efficacy.
outcome_measures.ui:placeholder: What are the specific outcome measures?

efficacy_measure.ui:help: Please indicate the dose of the compound to achieve half maximal inhibition of the process of interest.

efficacy_measure_type.ui:help: Please select which type of efficacy measure was reported in the previous entry.

in_vivo_data.ui:title: In Vivo Data
in_vivo_data.ui:description: Start entering data by selecting “Add Data”. If you have data from multiple experiments, you can select “Add Data” again to add additional data.

name.ui:placeholder: Enter a unique name for this experiment

strain.ui:placeholder: What strain of model was used?
strain.ui:help: What strain was the model (e.g. C57BL/6J substrain, APP/PS1 mice, LPS stimulated)?

outcome_measures.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the primary outcome measure

assay_description.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the assay and methods

age_range.ui:help: Please provide the age of the test subject at the time of testing.

ed50.ui:help: Please enter the dose that yielded 50 percent effectiveness in this study.

dose_regimen.ui:help: Please select the dosing regimen used in this study. Select acute for single dose; subchronic for dosing beyond acute treatment but < 1 month.

pretreatment_time.ui:help: Please describe the pretreatment time used for this experiment

drug_formulation.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the compound formulation

adverse_events_description.ui:help: Please indicate any unexpected or adverse events that were observed during the course of this study.

partition_coefficient.ui:help: Please provide the partition coefficient, which is the ratio of concentrations of a compound in a mixture of two immiscible phases at equilibrium.

dissociation_constant.ui:help: Please provide the pKa value, which is one method used to indicate the strength of an acid.

molecular_weight.ui:help: Please provide the in silico molecular weight of the compound in grams per mole (g/mol).
molecular_weight.ui:placeholder: Enter the in silico molecular weight

assay_description.ui:help: Please describe the in vitro assay that was used to estimate blood brain barrier penetration?

permeability.ui:help: Please detail the permeability of this compound to the blood brain barrier.
permeability.ui:placeholder: Describe the blood brain barrier permeability

lipophilicity.ui:help: Please provide the LogD, which is a log of partition of a chemical compound between the lipid and aqueous phases. The most popular lipid phase is octanol.

pk_in_vivo.ui:title: PK In Vivo
pk_in_vivo.ui:description: Start entering data by selecting “Add Data”. If you have data from multiple experiments, you can select “Add Data” again to add additional data.

name.ui:placeholder: Enter a unique name for this experiment

species.ui:help: What species was used for this study?

strain.ui:placeholder: What strain of model was used?
strain.ui:help: What strain was the model (e.g. C57BL/6J substrain, APP/PS1 mice, LPS stimulated)?

age_range.ui:help: Please provide the age of the test subjects at the time of testing.

sex.ui:help: Please indicate the sex of the subjects used in this study

clearance_rate.ui:help: Please provide the drug plasma clearance rate for the compound of interest.

half_life.ui:help: Please provide the drug half-life for the compound of interest.

tissue_concentration.ui:help: Please provide the tissue concentration for the compound of interest.

plasma_protein_binding.ui:help: Please provide the plasma protein binding for the compound of interest.

liver_metabolism.ui:help: Please describe the liver metabolism for the compound of interest.

fractional_bioavailability.ui:help: Please provide the bioavailability for the compound of interest.

plasma_max_concentration.ui:help: Please provide the maximum tissue concentration for the compound of interest.

volume.ui:help: Please provide the tissue volume of distribution for the compound of interest.
